hello.text: Hello doctor Yagokoro. I don't feel so good.

how.text: Drained out. I have a big headache since this morning as well.
No, I didn't drink anything weird. Quite the opposite actually.

what.text: I have been swimming in the part of the lake near the geysers. The water is surprisingly salty there.
Well, and now I have been waiting in the queue for ages.

check.text: {i}Her scales are very dry, potentially from the long wait in the queue.{s}

painkillers.text: {i}That should really help with my headache, thanks !{s}

water.text: Ah, thanks, this is revitalizing. More please !
She drinks jars of the liquid. Must have really been dehydrated.
